quizlist.question: Junge Menschen sind oft rebellisch, aber wenn sie älter werden legt sich das zum Glück wieder.
modern society has gone to far.
If people would talk less and work more, everybody would be better off.
An insult to our honor should always be punished.
The true way of life in our country is disappearing so fast that force may be necessary to preserve it.
Most people don't realize how much our lives are controlled by plots hatched in secret places.
Human nature being what it is, there will always be war and conflict.
A person who has bad manners, habits, and breeding can hardly expect to get along with decent people.
What this country needs is a few courageous, tireless, devoted leaders in whom the people can put their faith.
Pedophiles and serial rapists should be killed.
Nobody ever learned anything really important except through suffering.
Political correctness is destroying our free speech.
